original_text: So that the people could not discern the noise of the shout of joy from the noise of the weeping of the people: for the people shouted with a loud shout, and the noise was heard afar off.
korean_text: 백성이 크게 외치는 소리가 멀리 들리므로 즐거이 부르는 소리와 통곡하는 소리를 백성들이 분간하지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: So that people could not discern
the noise of shout of joy
from the noise of weeping of people
for the people shouted with a loud shout
and the noise was heard afar off
